Requirements: - The contract must not be paused."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role."},"setBatchingLimit(uint256)":{"details":"Set 'batching limit', called from admin Emits a {SetBatchingLimit} event"},"setFees(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Set 'fees', called from admin","params":{"stakeFee":": stake fee","unstakeFee":": unstake fee Emits a {SetFees} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake."}},"setMinimumValues(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Set 'minimum values', called from admin","params":{"minStake":": stake minimum value","minUnstake":": unstake minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to the stake and unstake."}},"setSTokensContract(address)":{"details":"Set 'contract address', called from constructor","params":{"sAddress":": stoken contract address Emits a {SetSTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address."}},"setUTokensContract(address)":{"details":"Set 'contract address', called from constructor","params":{"uAddress":": utoken contract address Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the utoken contract address."}},"setUnstakeEpoch(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Set 'unstake epoch', called from admin","params":{"epochInterval":": varies from 3 hours to 3 days Emits a {SetUnstakeEpoch} event with 'unstakeEpoch'","unstakeEpoch":": unstake epoch","unstakeEpochPrevious":": unstake epoch previous(initially set to same value as unstakeEpoch)"}},"setUnstakingLockTime(uint256)":{"details":"Set 'unstake props', called from admin","params":{"unstakingLockTime":": varies from 21 hours to 21 days Emits a {SetUnstakeProps} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake."}},"stake(address,uint256)":{"details":"Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)","params":{"to":": user address for staking, amount: number of tokens to stake Requirements: - `amount` cannot be less than zero. - 'amount' cannot be more than balance - 'amount' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance"}},"unStake(address,uint256)":{"details":"UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)","params":{"to":": user address for staking, amount: number of tokens to unstake Requirements: - `amount` cannot be less than zero. - 'amount' cannot be more than balance - 'amount' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance"}},"unpause()":{"details":"Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused."},"withdrawUnstakedTokens(address)":{"details":"Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)","params":{"staker":": user address for withdraw Requirements: - `current block timestamp` should be after 21 days from the period where unstaked function is @dev returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future
@dev returns the time left for unbonding to finish

@dev get Total Unbonded Tokens
 @param staker: account address

@dev get Total Unbonding Tokens
 @param staker: account address

@dev Set 'batching limit', called from admin
 Emits a {SetBatchingLimit} event

attributes.text: @dev get fees, min values, value divisor and epoch props
@dev returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future
@dev returns the time left for unbonding to finish

@dev get Total Unbonded Tokens
 @param staker: account address

@dev get Total Unbonding Tokens
 @param staker: account address

@dev Set 'batching limit', called from admin
 Emits a {SetBatchingLimit} event

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

getRoleMember(bytes32,uint256).details: Returns one of the accounts that have `role`. `index` must be a value between 0 and {getRoleMemberCount}, non-inclusive. Role bearers are not sorted in any particular way, and their ordering may change at any point. WARNING: When using {getRoleMember} and {getRoleMemberCount}, make sure you perform all queries on the same block. See the following https://forum.openzeppelin.com/t/iterating-over-elements-on-enumerableset-in-openzeppelin-contracts/2296[forum post] for more information.

getRoleMemberCount(bytes32).details: Returns the number of accounts that have `role`. Can be used together with {getRoleMember} to enumerate all bearers of a role.

getStakeUnstakeProps().details: get fees, min values, value divisor and epoch props

getUnstakeEpochMilestone(uint256).details: returns the nearest epoch milestone in the future

getUnstakeTime(uint256).details: returns the time left for unbonding to finish

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.details: Constructor for initializing the LiquidStaking contract.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

setBatchingLimit(uint256).details: Set 'batching limit', called from admin Emits a {SetBatchingLimit} event

params.unstakeFee: : unstake fee Emits a {SetFees} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake.

params.minUnstake: : unstake minimum value Emits a {SetMinimumValues} event with 'minimum value' set to the stake and unstake.

params.sAddress: : stoken contract address Emits a {SetSTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the stoken contract address.

params.uAddress: : utoken contract address Emits a {SetUTokensContract} event with '_contract' set to the utoken contract address.

params.epochInterval: : varies from 3 hours to 3 days Emits a {SetUnstakeEpoch} event with 'unstakeEpoch'
params.unstakeEpochPrevious: : unstake epoch previous(initially set to same value as unstakeEpoch)

params.unstakingLockTime: : varies from 21 hours to 21 days Emits a {SetUnstakeProps} event with 'fee' set to the stake and unstake.

stake(address,uint256).details: Stake utokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount'(Burn uTokens and Mint sTokens)

params.to: : user address for staking, amount: number of tokens to stake Requirements: - `amount` cannot be less than zero. - 'amount' cannot be more than balance - 'amount' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance

unStake(address,uint256).details: UnStake stokens over the platform with address 'to' for desired 'amount' (Burn sTokens and Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)

params.to: : user address for staking, amount: number of tokens to unstake Requirements: - `amount` cannot be less than zero. - 'amount' cannot be more than balance - 'amount' plus new balance should be equal to the old balance

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

withdrawUnstakedTokens(address).details: Lock the unstaked tokens for 21 days, user can withdraw the same (Mint uTokens with 21 days locking period)

params.staker: : user address for withdraw Requirements: - `current block timestamp` should be after 21 days from the period where unstaked function is called.
